title: Henry County man sentenced to 18 years for molesting 5-year-old girl
title_page: Henry County man sentenced to 18 years for molesting 5-year-old girl
text:
A Henry County man was sentenced Monday to 18 years in prison after being convicted of molesting a 5-year-old girl, prosecutors said.
Steven Lee Anderson, 38, of Locust Grove, was found guilty of forcing the child to touch his genitals in Sept. 2017, a spokeswoman for the Henry County District Attorney’s office said in a news release.
The girl told her mother shortly after the incident, but Anderson wasn’t arrested until Friday, according to Henry County Jail records.
In addition to his prison time, Anderson must register as a sex offender for life and have no contact with the victim or her mother, the release said.
